answers.answer: Yes... the last month is the hardest and it will pass before you even realize it
I'm in the same boat. I just try to keep myself busy so the days go by faster... It helps a bit.
You are lucky you just need to feel great, because you dont have any health problem.Im in 34 as well dealing with high BP and preeclampsia, and praying to have a healthy baby.
Thank u ladies I just want to have my baby and feel normal again

I'm 34 weeks as well and yes I'm done .. I just got put on half days for work which will be nice but I feel like she's never going to get here . I Hope the next few weeks fly by for both of us ;-) all the best to you and your new bundle of joy :-)

question: Hey ladies so I'm 34 weeks pregnant and .I honestly feel like I can't go anymore I just want my baby out is it normal to feel this way???
title: can't anymore
